akas: Dag & Nacht: Hotel Eburon Belgium (Flemish title) (long title)
akas from release info: Dag & Nacht: Hotel Eburon Belgium (Flemish title) (long title)

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Hotel Eburon in Tongeren (in the Belgian province Limburg) welcomes its owner, Mr. Sanders, after general manager Ludo Van Dijck was sacked. Maintenace manager Bert keeps stealing cleaners' tips and scamming on repairs. All staff either hopes for promotion or fears for their jobs. Sander's request for an 'extra pillow' raises the question whether he means that literally or in the slang sense of an 'escort'. A new staff recruit's arrival is barely noticed, but proves crucial.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Now Nathalie is officially in charge, Mathias is as eager to show she's not needed as unwilling to help her. Fickle fashion-designer Bruno Gembers booked a suite for a fur collection photo-shoot. Chamber-maid Eef is easily persuaded by hunky boy-friend Nick to help his animal rights activist group protest out- and inside, hardly squaring with staff loyalty. Titus encourages shy widower Jef Veldkamp to start courting widow Germaine Delcour. The annual reenactment of Gallic revolt-leader Ambirix's victory of Caesar features new participants and problems.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Amber haughtily ignores Titus's warning against dating apparently attractive aristocratic big spender David 'Dave' d'Oplinter, whom he knows better. Mathias has had enough of newbie Nathalie needlessly bugging him. His friend, her predecessor Ludo, checks in as paying client, determined to make her life hell, even pretending to be suicidal, and let mate Mathias 'save the day'. Porn king Freddy is making one of his movies in an Eburon suit, unannounced. Hotel staff agonizes whether to obstruct or oblige, cast has surprising emotional complications.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Owner Sanders decrees economizing by sacking a staff member. Word gets out, so every employee digs up a sob story, Titus embellished his acting dream as inspired by Natalie. She now delegates the axing to Matthias. Meanwhile Hongkong tourist Sato insists photogenic Amber poses for him. Lena gets a visit from her snobbish parents, Louis and Damienne Daelman, whom she told fiancé Vincent is the manager, but he objects to playing along. Sylvia's daughter is marrying an Italian, but Paolo's ma wants the wedding in Perugia, Sylvia in Eburon and/or the Tongeren basilica.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Showbiz manager Ben Severs booked the hotel as venue to present new boys-band Drax to the press. He keeps the poor kids on a mercilessly tight leash and imposes a ridiculous childish Beach Boys-type repertoire. After Titus smuggles in complimentary whiskey, Casper reconsiders. His mates Karim and Kenji are unable to stop him from rebelling, although Severs threatens to cancel their launch. An archaeologist, called to Tongeren to authenticate an Ancient coins find, happens to be Nathalie's ex.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Eburon hotel is visited by high-roller poker players for an informal tournament. Titus, an accomplished Internet amateur, eagerly accepts an invitation to join them. Titus tells Amber their winning exceed a million, so Amber, who initially belittled rising start 'pokerkid' as a ridiculous baby, now starts courting him. Titus can't really raise the seed money, but is confident enough he will multiply his winnings to stake the 5,000 Euro cash Gino gave him to buy a Ferrari for Gino's son.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: After Karl Boon's home burns down, Nathalie offers the Boon family free residence in Eburon, as a media stunt. But the Boons prove a horrible lot of rude, even dangerous parasites. Now she begs Mathias to get rid of them, anyway that doesn't ruin the hotel's image. Gino's elderly friend, opera singer Rosa Descamps, stays in the hotel. A misunderstanding leads Titus to spread the rumor her godchild Sari is being abused by the old lady.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Amber's former school-buddy Mathilde drops off her fiancé Peter Van de Wijngaerd for his bachelor's party. Amber discovers he spends it in bed with another woman. Novelist Karel Elewijt checks in with writer's block and complains about noise and other bother, but actually ends up with inspiration. Caveman trucker Stany Meuris was dragged to the hotel's new 'romantic package' by his wife Rosa, but can't stand any sophistication or even minor deviations from his routine. When Rosa dumps him, Titus and Nat try to give him a makeover, with poetic help from Karel. Lena ...

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: The hotel is honored that cycling team manager Hugo Samyn picked Eburon for a press-covered celebration. Titus unfortunately breaks a pile of expensive champagne bottles. So he's eager to cover the loss by selling saucy information on the team's star, handsome Jurgen Lados, who is desperate to hide why he doesn't enjoy 'party girls'.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: The staff is terrified when a cockroach is spotted in a guest couple's salad. Actually they milk that for outrageous free pampering, but PR counts extra now internationally renowned archeology professor Antoine Chabert stays in the hotel to reveal his findings about the city's most enigmatic museum piece, the 'dodekaëder' (a twelve-sided Roman era object), which only Vincent is intellectually interested in. Meanwhile Eve has stupidly offered her lunch and free lodgings to an illegal homeless person, who puts her key-card to utterly wrong use, with surprising results.

imdb.title: Dag & nacht
